00074 /*
00075         "Front" View, screen
00076 
00077 
00078              ViewY
00079   offset   |
00080         +----------------> ScreenX
00081         |          |            |
00082         |          |            |
00083         |          |            |
00084         |----------------
00085     v      |
00086    SceenY  |
00087                    |
00088   ---------+------------> ViewX
00089           Oview
00090 
00091         The offset (screen offset) is measured in view coordinates
00092         from the view origin to the offset point.
00093 
00094 
00095         "Side" View, word
00096 
00097         WorldZ
00098         |
00099         |
00100         |     ViewY
00101         |     /
00102         |    /
00103         |   / 
00104         |  /
00105         | /
00106         |/
00107         +---------------------WorldY
00108         |\_
00109         |  \_
00110         |    \_ ViewZ
00111 
00112 
00113         "Top" View, Map (Should be right angles)
00114 
00115                           WorldY
00116                            /|\
00117                           /     | \
00118                          /      |  \
00119                 MapY \  |  /Mapx
00120                           \     | /
00121                            \|/
00122         ---------------------- WorldX
00123 */
00124
